subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Undone by a pair of two-out errors, the Mets proceeded to allow six consecutive Giants to reach base, culminating in Bengie Molina’s second homer of the nine-run inning.
snippet: Undone by a pair of two-out errors, the Mets proceeded to allow six consecutive Giants to reach base, culminating in Bengie Molina’s second homer of the nine-run inning.
